Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 15 rebounds, and 12 assists
The Nuggets let their foot off the gas defensively in the second half and once they finally turned the game over to their bench Phoenix was able to seize control
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game ended up being close throughout
The Suns had their outside shot going early on and the Nuggets were cold
Porter Jr. was the exception to that and even though Phoenix pulled ahead early, MPJ sparked a run to get Denver back out in front
